Class SearchCriteriaDTO

java.lang.Object
it.uninsubria.dto.SearchCriteriaDTO
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SearchCriteriaDTO extends Object implements Serializable
Data Transfer Object for restaurant search criteria. This class encapsulates the various search parameters that can be used to filter restaurants in the searchRestaurant() functionality. It implements Serializable to allow transfer between client and server components. This class implements the Builder pattern to allow for easy, modular construction of search criteria with only the parameters that are needed.
See Also:

    • hasValidCoordinates

      public boolean hasValidCoordinates()
      Validates whether this search criteria has the mandatory location information. The latitude and longitude coordinates must be provided.
      Returns:
      true if the criteria contains valid location coordinates, false otherwise
